statements.statement: Your Body score is Good.No need to Worry!
statements.quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
statements.author: Jim Rohn

statements.statement: Your Cardic score is Good.No need to Worry!
statements.quote: A healthy heart is a sign of a healthy life.
statements.author: Mehmet Oz

statements.statement: Your Pulmonary score is Good.No need to Worry!
statements.quote: When the breath is unsteady, all is unsteady; when the breath is still, all is still.
statements.author: Hatha Yoga Pradipika

statements.statement: Your Muscle score is Good.No need to Worry!
statements.quote: Your muscles are your best investment. Work hard and watch them grow.
statements.author: Unknown

statements.statement: Your Immune score is Good.No need to Worry!
statements.quote: Your immune system is a superhero within you, fighting off threats and keeping you safe. Celebrate its power and support it with healthy habits.
statements.author: Unknown

statements.statement: Your renal score is Good.No need to Worry!
statements.quote: Kidneys are the body's natural filters, and they work best when you drink enough water.
statements.author: Annaliese Griffin

statements.statement: Your hepatic score is Good.No need to Worry!
statements.quote: Your liver is your body's primary detoxifier. Keeping it healthy is essential to your overall well-being.
statements.author: Sarah Ballantyne

statements.statement: Your metabolic score is Good.No need to Worry!
statements.quote: Your metabolism is like a fire. Feed it well and it will burn bright. Neglect it, and it will smolder.
statements.author: Anonymous

statements.statement: Your Brain score is Good.No need to Worry!
statements.quote: Your brain is capable of extraordinary things. Believe in its potential, nurture its growth, and watch it soar to new heights.
statements.author: Unknown
